issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Add support for Partitioning to ParquetDatasetFactory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8943](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8943). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Follow-up on ARROW-8062: the ParquetDatasetFactory currently does not yet support specifying a Partitioning / inferring with a PartitioningFactory.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8943?focusedCommentId=17139501) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7437
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7437>
